body.p: As you find the correct pairings that maximize the number of hydrogen bonds within pairs, what else do you notice about the structure of the correct pairs?

feedback.p: In all cases, a large purine is paired with a smaller pyrimidine, so the size of the base pair is conserved.

explanation.p: In all cases, a large purine is paired with a smaller pyrimidine, so the size of the base pair is conserved.
